Author: markexclamationmark
Text: Oh no! :( hope you're okay! Congrats on reaching a goal but go easy on yourself for a few days hun ❤️ no good being sub 120 and too weak to enjoy it - stay safe!

Author: TinyPorcelainDoll
Text: Ugh, that was me a month ago... it was embarrassing and gross because I almost fainted after pooping myself violently for several minutes straight in a stall at work. I'm still struggling a bit to get under 120...
